scripts.dist: npm run dist-version && npm run build && gulp default minified shims && npm run dist-types
scripts.dist-bip39: gulp bip39-es bip39-fr bip39-it bip39-ja bip39-ko bip39-zh
scripts.dist-version: node -e "let v = require('./package.json').version; require('fs').writeFileSync('./src.ts/_version.ts', 'export const version = \"' + v +'\";\n')"
scripts.eslint: eslint index.js contracts/*.js providers/*.js utils/*.js wallet/*.js wordlists/*.js
scripts.test: if [ "$RUN_PHANTOMJS" = "1" ]; then npm run-script test-phantomjs; else npm run-script test-node; fi
scripts.test-node: npm run dist-test && mocha --no-colors --reporter tests/reporter tests/test-*.js
scripts.test-phantomjs: npm run dist-test && gulp tests && phantomjs --web-security=false ./node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-core/mocha-phantomjs-core.js ./tests/test.html ./tests/reporter.js
